resources.string: You are standing in your front yard next to your mailbox, when a sudden cold realization creeps over you. You forgot to bring your house key with you to school. Your parents don\'t get home from work for hours. In a sigh of exasperation you decide to start scouring for a way in.

Your back yard stretches before you, freshly cut... last week. A sliding back door sits on this side of the house as well as a small window, and a normal sized one to the right of that. A ladder rests against the house next to it. Your dad has a pile of junk he needs to get to the dump stacked against the fence. The only thing of note is an old ladder.

You follow the pathway to the side of the house that has your dad\'s tool shed. It\'s about the size of a closet, but has a very sturdy lockable door. Your window sits here, up one story, is it slightly open? You aren\'t sure if you remembered to close it last night.

You step onto your porch where a white door stands in front of you accompanied by an old welcome mat. A window to your left gives you a slight glimpse of the video game console you wish you were currently playing.
I\'m not sure how that would help
